seo.title: Manarola Agriturismi 2025 | Farm Stays & Rural Accommodations
seo.description: Authentic farm stays near Manarola. Experience wine production, home-cooked meals, and peaceful countryside settings.

body.title: Agriturismi & Farm Stays
body.subtitle: Experience authentic Italian countryside. Stay at working farms and vineyards in the hills above Manarola with panoramic views.

features.title: Agriturismo Sciacchetrà
features.description: Working vineyard producing famous wine. Rooms with terraces overlooking the sea.

features.title: Agriturismo Volastra
features.description: Hilltop location near the sanctuary. Organic vegetables and homemade wine.

features.title: La Sosta
features.description: Traditional farmhouse with home-cooked dinners. Stunning views of three villages.

features.title: Ca' du Ferrà
features.description: Olive grove and vineyard setting. Farm-to-table breakfast with local products.

features.title: Buranco Agriturismo
features.description: Panoramic terrace restaurant open to non-guests. Spectacular sunset dining.

features.title: Agriturismo Villanova
features.description: Peaceful countryside retreat. Learn about wine-making and olive oil production.
